name: Ext_R5_DeviceMetric_measurementFrequency
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceMetric.measurementFrequency for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceMetric.measurementFrequency from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceMetric|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Indicates how often the metric is taken or recorded
element.definition: The frequency at which the metric is taken or recorded. Devices measure metrics at a wide range of frequencies; for example, an ECG might sample measurements in the millisecond range, while an NIBP might trigger only once an hour. Less often, the measurementFrequency may be based on a unit other than time, such as distance (e.g. for a measuring wheel). The update period may be different than the measurement frequency, if the device does not update the published observed value with the same frequency as it was measured.
element.comment: `DeviceMetric.measurementFrequency` has no related element in R4B:DeviceMetric
